message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product from me. As you may know, my track record shows that 50% of my products are high-quality. I'm not at liberty to disclose the exact worth of this product, but I can assure you that it's a one-of-a-kind item. Considering the uncertainty, I'm offering it to you for $10000. Will you take the chance and make an offer?
I trust the 50/50 quality chance and am willing to pay $10000 for the product.

However, I want to be transparent with you - my last product was not high-quality. I'm not sure what that means for this one, but I'm still offering it to you for $10000. Would you like to take a chance and see if this one is the exception?
